name: Revenant Raid
description:
You are Dendour Thunderbreaker, a mighty dwarf warrior. Over the years you've slain countless monsters to protect your hometown. However one day, while on an expedition to the next town over, the souls of the monsters you've slain have returned from the dead to exact their revenge.

*NOTE: It's recommended to download the game as the pitch changes do not work on the webgl build

Game made in 24 hours for Dev League Season 1

The game was inspired by 10/20 minutes til dawn. Go check the game out if you haven't already. https://flanne.itch.io/10-minutes-till-dawn

Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left click - Fire
Right click - Dash
R - Reload
Esc - Pause
Shift - Walk (makes your bullets spread out less)

Credits

Game made by Ategon

(External Assets)
Entity sprites by Elthen
Background tileset by Cainos
Music by Sidearm Studios
Font by CopheeMoth
Gun by SnoopethDuckDuck
